Text: CEFTLarge cap growth stock to consider is Concord EFS Ticker is CEFT Provides electronic authorization services for purchases settlement services clearing house operations and funds transfers Steady uptrend over the last three years with little sensitivity to market swings Very highly recommended stock with strong buy recommendations EPS growth in range and PEG of Looks like a good stock to dampen volatility while still getting positives of the growing ecommerce volumedollarstransaction numbers Paul
